TopicTitle: PLEASE HELP! Staging menu doesn't appear and does not work (UNPLAYABLE)w

Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I have been having problems lately resulting in the game unplayable for me.

The staging menu on the left does not show up at all. Also when I press space, all I hear is a little click sound and nothing happens.

I have to default activate parts which is almost impossible to do in-flight and will throw your ship off course due to only being able to activate one part at a time.

The game is unplayable.

Thanks, Please help!
Hello, if you want help read this please: How to get support for modded installs
That happens when you install a mod wrong or there is a bad file path somewhere more info would be nice to get better and more help.
